issue.description: The alignment of RefSeq NM_001031811.1 (Kcnh8) to the reference genome suggests a possible assembly error within AC131674.2
issue.resolution_text: AC131674.2 has been updated (with inverted repeat fixed) to AC131674.3 and submitted to GenBank. Fix should be reflected in Build 38.

issue.status_text: We will perform PCR for indel on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference in the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_011413.2 (C4a) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Data suggests there is a possible tiling path error in this region. Region under review.
issue.resolution_text: AC175035.3 found to be redundant.

issue.status_text: PMID:2379238 states this gene is defective in C57BL/6. Looking more into this as it is possibly a strain variation issue.
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference in the proteins encoded by the RefSeq for H2-T10 (GeneID:15024, NM_010395.6) and the genomic sequence on the reference chromosome to which it aligns. The Reference Sequence at positions 36257228-36257238 of NC_000083.5 have been verified. Reported discrepancies at this site may reflect unrecognized variation or segmental duplication.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: We will attempt PCR in the region on C57BL/6J DNA.
issue.description: AC107868.9 has a 1-nt insertion compared to NM_134195.2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: The reference has been verified, but the existence of contradictory C57BL/6J sequences may be evidence for unrecognized intra-strain variation. This issue will be re-visited when an SOP for investigation of mouse variation is developed.
issue.description: Possible indel or mismatch in CR974472.7 as it aligns to NM_177635.1. The Reference Sequence at position 36686198 of NC_000083.5 has been verified. Reported discrepancies at this site may reflect unrecognized variation or segmental duplication.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: We will perform PCR on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: AC112683.10 has a 1-nt insertion compared to NM_001097623.1 resulting in a frameshift and premature termination.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: The component AC161814.2 may be redundant to sequence on reference chr. 17
issue.resolution_text: AC161814.2 was found to be redundant. I will also label it redundant in the Curator's Links page.

issue.description: The unplaced component CT485609.15 may be redundant to sequence on reference chr. 17.
issue.resolution_text: CT485609.15 has been found to be redundant with AC165972.4 and AC164314.5. This was the sole component of Mm37 chr.17 unlocalized contig NT_166326. This component should be excluded from future builds.

issue.status_text: We will perform PCR on C57BL/6J to see if the transcript belongs to the Reference Assembly.
issue.description: Olfr100 (GeneID 404307) not found on the reference
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: genomic deletion coding for a coding exon of Nrxn gene.
issue.description: An in-frame coding exon of the Nrxn gene is missing from the current genomic sequence.
issue.resolution_text: Build 37 Reference genome has a functional representation of this locus.

issue.status_text: We will attempt PCR in an effort to locate this gene in BL6.
issue.description: Tcp10a (GeneID:21460, NM_009340.1) is missing from the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Nts 1-28 of NM_024250.4 do not align to AC154411.2. Also, nts 37, 48, 51, 60, 70, 95 and 105 have mismatches to AC154411.2.
issue.resolution_text: Changed switchpoints to include more of AC182749.2 and less of AC154411.2 in the Reference

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC174679.2 and AC119998.13
issue.resolution_text: The progress of this gap can now be followed in MG-4198

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC173344.2 and AC174800.2
issue.resolution_text: The progress of this gap can now be followed in MG-4199.

issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC164306.3 and AC166164.2
issue.resolution_text: This issue can now be followed in ticket MG-4200

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unlocalized contig NT_166327 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166327 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: NT_166327/CT571241.23 is redundant with AC168063.3

issue.summary: The sequence for CT010495.10 does not belong to RP23-225G13
issue.description: The sequence for CT010495.10 does not belong to RP23-225G13
issue.resolution_text: The correct sequence data has now been submitted for CT010495.11 (RP23-226G14).

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC098880.4
issue.status_text: This issue will be re-visited when an SOP for investigation of mouse variation is developed.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC098880.4. The Reference Sequence at position 22826838 of NC_000083.5 has been verified. Reported discrepancies at this site may reflect unrecognized variation or segmental duplication.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC154823.2.
issue.status_text: The reference has been verified, but the existence of contradictory C57BL/6J sequences may be evidence for unrecognized intra-strain variation. This issue will be re-visited when an SOP for investigation of mouse variation is developed.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC154823.2 The Reference Sequence at position 68102223 of NC_000083.5 has been verified. Reported discrepancies at this site may reflect unrecognized variation or segmental duplication.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Retile mouse MHC with single library path?
issue.description: Investigate whether the MHC should be replaced with a single library path.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: AC241886.2 has a Mouse Chrom. 24 designation in Genbank. AC241886.2 belongs to Chrom. 17
issue.resolution_text: The chromosome designation for CH25-391H21 has been updated to Chromosome 17 in GenBank.

issue.description: H2-Q9 may be missing from the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: CU467494.10 has been added to both the Chromosome 17 TPF and the Chromosome 17 Patches TPF to provide alignment of H2-Q9 in the Reference.

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC112683.10
issue.status_text: We will perform PCR on BL6 DNA in the region to determine if the Reference is correct.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC112683.10
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC166099.2 and AC166110.3 in MGSCv37
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between AC166099.2 and AC166110.3.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Inversion in the overlap between components AC125224.3 and AC182748.2
issue.description: There is an inversion in the overlap between components AC125224.3 and AC182748.2
issue.resolution_text: Mis-assembled component AC125224.3 has been removed from the Chromosome 17 TPF. Flanking components CT009635.18 and AC182748.2 have end-to-end overlap so no further work is needed here.

issue.summary: WGS spans ~130kb region between CT010433.6 and CT009755.8 in MGSCv37
issue.status_text: RP23-118K13 has been placed in our sequencing pipeline
issue.description: WGS spanning ~130kb region between CT010433.6 and CT009755.8 is to be replaced with clone-based sequence.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: We will conduct PCR on C57BL/6J DNA to determine whether or not this pseudogene is found in C57BL/6J.
issue.description: NG_005954.1 does not have alignment with the Reference.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: We will conduct PCR on C57BL/6J DNA to determine whether or not this pseudogene is found in C57BL/6J.
issue.description: NG_004709.1 does not align to the Reference
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Gap between AC162923.2 and CT010445.12 may possibly be closed with a 6 bp overlap
issue.description: Possible short (6 bp) overlap between gap flanking components AC162923.2 and CT010445.12.
issue.resolution_text: AC211870.4 (sequencing in-progress) was removed from the TPF as AC162923.2 and CT010445.12 do have an overlap at their cut-site. This is validated by WGS CAAA01009585.1.

issue.summary: Should we retain MGSCv37 chr. 17 unlocalized scaffold NT_166326.1?
issue.description: Should we retain MGSCv37 chr. 17 unlocalized scaffold NT_166326.1 in future assemblies?
issue.resolution_text: CT485609.15 (RP23-74C21), the sole component of NT_166326.1 will be dropped from future assembly versions b/c it is redundant to components on chr. 17 (NC_000083.5).

issue.summary: Should we retain MGSCv37 chr. 17 unlocalized scaffold NT_166328.1?
issue.description: Should we retain MGSCv37 chr. 17 unlocalized scaffold NT_166328.1 in future assembly versions?
issue.resolution_text: CU041227.10 (RP23-16P9), an updated version of this scaffold's sole component is now on the chr. 17 TPF, replacing MGSCv37 NC_000083.5 component AC161814.2 (RP24-120E13).

issue.description: There is a pre-centromeric gap in Build 37 on Chrom. 17 occupied by WGS components in Build 37.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chrom. 17 Phase 2 Component AC126409.8 replaced with AC192777.4
issue.description: Chrom. 17 Phase 2 Component AC126409.8 replaced with AC192777.4
issue.resolution_text: Chrom. 17 Phase 2 Component AC126409.8 replaced with AC192777.4

issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has has a gap between components AC151473.3 and AC154346.3 which contains WGS components
issue.resolution_text: AC206884.2 was added to overlap both AC151473.3 and AC154346.3, making CAAA01042038.1, CAAA01042041.1 and CT737226.3 redundant.

issue.description: There is a possible inversion within AC167249.2 (RP23-41C8).
issue.resolution_text: The inversion in AC167249.2, present in Mouse Build37, was corrected and AC167249 was re-submitted (AC167249.3). This change will be reflected in Build38

issue.description: AC151285.2 (RP23-426D6) contains contamination (IS1)
issue.resolution_text: Contamination in AC151285.2 (RP23-426D6) has been removed and the clone resubmitted.

issue.summary: Alt loci clone AC087217.1 contains contamination
issue.description: AC087217.1, a component of the MGSCv37 129x1/svj alt locus, contains contamination.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product PCR_129X1SVJ_AC087217_1 (FO203517.1) has been generated and submitted. The PCR product removes an IS10 insertion and one copy of the target site duplication in GRCm38 129X1/SvJ alternate loci scaffold NT_039662.3 component AC087217.1.

issue.summary: possible rearrangement moving first exons of H2-Q6
issue.status_text: When budget allows, PCR should be performed in the region to determine whether or not AF111102.2 contains a mis-assembly.
issue.description: A possible rearrangement in this clone moving the first three exons of gene H2-Q6 more upstream, closer to gene H2-Q4 and leaving it straddling two pseudogenes, compared to the reference genome and other mouse strains or haplotypes.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Curate alignment for AC139329.3 and AC132353.3
issue.description: Alignments associated with AC139329.3 and AC132353.3 in the GRC database require curation.
issue.resolution_text: A curated single alignment for the overlap between AC139329.3 and AC132353.3 has been loaded to the GRC database and marked as 'preferred'.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC241886.2 and AC119998.13 in GRCm38.
issue.status_text: Since this gap is mathematically closed or very close to being closed, we plan on conducting PCR in an attempt to close this gap.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket MG-3491
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC244119.3 and AC244135.3 in GRCm38.
issue.status_text: Radioactive hybridization probes have been generated for this gap
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket MG-3492
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC164306.3 and AC241601.3 in GRCm38.
issue.status_text: CH25-260B23 has been selected for sequencing to extend off of AC241601.3
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket MG-3493.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: The sequence for CT573084.4 does not belong to RP23-226G14
issue.description: The sequence for CT573084.4 does not belong to RP23-226G14.
issue.resolution_text: CT573084.4 is now assigned correctly to clone RP23-225G13.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components CT033757.6 and AC154423.2.
issue.description: There is a gap in the Reference between components CT033757.6 and AC154423.2.
issue.resolution_text: CT010495.11 has now been corrected (was previously incorrect data from RP23-225G13 (MG-3850) and added to the patches TPF and the chromosome TPF, replacing the WGS sequences CAAA01035565.1, CAAA01182071.1 and CAAA01035560.1, closing the gap.

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Reference component CR974457.17 may be missing sequence, disrupting the alignment of H2-Ea (GeneID:14968)
issue.resolution_text: Reference (CR974457.17) does represent a valid C57BL/6 haplotype of NM_010381.2

issue.status_text: Contacting Jo Wood at Sanger to see if Black6 optical data shows the Reference is missing data in this region.
issue.description: LOC100045026 (GeneID:100045026, NM_001039241.2) is missing from the assembly.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Part of LOC100044193 (GeneID:100044193, NM_001024731.1) may extend off the final component in reference chr.17
issue.resolution_text: CH25-66I12 (AC225448) has been added to the end of chromosome 17 and aligns with nts 96-2491 of NM_001024731.1

issue.description: H2-Q5 (GeneID:15016, NM_010393.2) is missing from the reference chromosomes in Build 37.
issue.resolution_text: H2-Q5 was successfully annotated in GRCm38 (Annotation Release 103) so this issue is resolved.
